title: Sample T2D-GWAS Data — T2DGWAS
text: Genome-wide association study (GWAS) T2D Finnish population

title: Sample T2D-GWAS Data — T2DGWAS
Sample T2D-GWAS Data — T2DGWAS
text: 'T2DGWAS' contains association p-values SNPs dbGaP (Analysis ID: pha002839). 	total 306,368 SNPs p-values available. data also comes data frames "snpGeneMap", "snpGeneP", "snpMap" "T2DGWASGene" "snpMap" map positions based GRCh37, generated snpGeneSets function 	getSNPMap(). "snpGeneMap" mapping SNP gene, generated snpGeneSets function 	snp2Gene(). "snpGeneP" similar "snpGeneMap", additional column GWAS p-values 	SNPs "T2DGWASGene" uniform score T2DGWAS gene measures minP, 2ndP, simP fishP. 	generated function getGeneMeasure().

title: Sample T2D-GWAS Data — T2DGWAS
text: Scott LJ, Mohlke KL, Bonnycastle LL, Willer CJ, Li Y, Duren WL, Erdos MR, Stringham HM, Chines PS, Jackson AU et al: genome-wide association study type 2 diabetes Finns detects multiple susceptibility variants. Science 2007, 316(5829):1341-1345.

title: Sample T2D-GWES Data — T2DGWES
text: Genome-wide expression study (GWES) differential gene expression pancreases 10 control 10 T2D human subjects

title: Sample T2D-GWES Data — T2DGWES
Sample T2D-GWES Data — T2DGWES
text: 'T2DGWES' data loads data frame variable, "T2DExpression", shows 	differential gene expression p-values T2D control subjects. data frame contains 	20,185 genes gene symbol, Entrez gene ID differential p-value. p-values  	obtained method linear models empirical Bayes adjusting.

title: Sample T2D-GWES Data — T2DGWES
text: Marselli L, Thorne J, Dahiya S, Sgroi DC, Sharma , Bonner-Weir S, Marchetti P, Weir GC: Gene expression profiles Beta-cell enriched tissue obtained laser capture microdissection subjects type 2 diabetes. PLoS One 2010, 5(7):e11499

title: Pathway analysis by aligator — aligator
text: function performs pathway analysis every pathway particular MSigDB gene-set category using ALIGATOR algorithm, returns pathway-specific unadjusted p-value adjusted p-value permutation tests.

title: Pathway analysis by aligator — aligator
Pathway analysis by aligator — aligator
text: snpGeneP specifies data frame containing columns 'snp', 'gene_id' 'p', 	lists analyzed SNPs, SNP-mapped genes  GWAS SNP association p-value setType 'setType' integer numeric value gene-set category [0,20]. specifies gene 	set category MSigDB, every gene set tested enrichment. 	setType takes default value 2 ("C2: curated gene sets").  complete list gene set 	category can obtained 'getSetType' function. Nsample number random samples generated calculating pathway-specific unadjusted p-value Btimes number bootstrap procedures conducting permutation tests get pathway adjusted p-value pcut numerical value. defines cut-point p-value SNP association selecting 'significant' 	SNPs pathway test. seed seed number ALIGATOR-based pathway test

title: Pathway analysis by aligator — aligator
text: pathway analysis based ALIGATOR algorithm. takes data frame 'snpGeneP' 	contains character vector 'snp', integer/numeric vector 'gene_id' SNP-mapped genes (Entrez 	gene ID) numeric vector 'p' GWAS SNP association p-value. analysis uses preselected 	p-value threshold ('pcut') select significant SNPs testing enrichment mapped genes. 	pathway-specific unadjusted p-value calculated randomly generated 'Nsample' samples, 	pathway adjusted p-value obtained 'Btimes' bootstrap-based permutations.

title: Pathway analysis by aligator — aligator
text: returned value data frame. contains integer vector 'pid' pathway ID, 	numeric vector 'p' pathway-specific unadjusted p-value numeric vector 'adj_p' 	pathway adjusted p-value permutations.

title: Pathway analysis by aligator — aligator
text: Holmans, P., et al. (2009). "Gene ontology analysis GWA study data sets provides insights biology bipolar disorder." J Hum Genet 85(1): 13-24.

title: Pathway analysis by aligator — aligator
text: H. Mei; L Li

title: Pathway analysis by aligator — aligator

what: Pathway enrichment test I based on a given vector of candidate genes — enrichTest1
title: Pathway enrichment test I based on a given vector of candidate genes — enrichTest1
text: function conducts general enrichment analysis , test pathway enrichment provided candidate genes.

title: Pathway enrichment test I based on a given vector of candidate genes — enrichTest1
Pathway enrichment test I based on a given vector of candidate genes — enrichTest1
text: genes integer numeric vector Entrez Gene ID. Gene ID can obtained HGNC gene symbol 	'getGeneMap' function hitSize 'hitSize' defines minimum number candidate genes ('genes') gene set must contain 	enrichment analysis. word, pathway gene set  number candidate genes 	 < 'hitSize', gene set/pathway tested enrichment,  'NA' value instead 	 assigned. 'hitSize' takes default value 0, indicating limitation test. setType 'setType' integer numeric value gene-set category [0,20]. specifies gene 	set category MSigDB, every gene set tested enrichment. 	'setType' takes default value 2 ("C2: curated gene sets").  complete list gene set 	category can obtained 'getSetType' function.

title: Pathway enrichment test I based on a given vector of candidate genes — enrichTest1
text: enrichment analysis focused vector candidate genes aims test genes 	significantly clustered particular gene sets. enrichment analysis takes 'genes' candidate 	genes genes 'setType' background. tested gene set, analysis measures p-value component gene randomly 'genes' 	hypergeometric distribution. higher proportion component candidate genes pathway indicate 	candidate genes likely clustered tested gene set.

title: Pathway enrichment test I based on a given vector of candidate genes — enrichTest1
text: returned value list. enrich_test data frame pathway enrichment results every gene set/pathway 	specified gene-set category ('setType'). 'pid': MSigDB gene-set ID. gene-set information 				'pid' can obtained function 'getGeneSetInfo' 'size': shows number genes MSigDB gene set ; 'genesSize': number candidate genes 				pathway includes. 'effect': increased percentage candidate genes pathway 				random expected percentage. 'sd': estimated standard error 'effect'. 'pval': empirical p-value pathway enrichment based exact hypergeometric 				test.  useGenes integer vector Entrez gene ID. lists candidate genes ('genes') belong 	specified gene-set category(setType) used enrichment analysis nGenes number background genes specified gene-set category(setType) used 	enrichment test . nTopGenes number candidate genes ('genes') belongs specified gene-set 		category ('setType') setTypeInfo list shows information specified gene-set category, 'setType' id: gene-set category ID symbol: gene-set category symbol name: gene-set category name description: gene-set category description

title: Permutation analysis of the enrichment test I — enrichTest1_Perm
Permutation analysis of the enrichment test I — enrichTest1_Perm
text: genesSize specifies fixed number candidate genes simulated enrichment test hitSize 'hitSize' defines minimum number genes candidate genes, simulated 	number 'genesSize', gene set must contain enrichment analysis. 	word, pathway gene set  number genes simulated candidate 	genes  < 'hitSize', gene set/pathway tested enrichment p-value,  'NA' 	value instead assigned. 'hitSize' takes default value 0, indicating limitation 	test. setType 'setType' integer numeric value gene-set category [0,20]. specifies gene 	set category MSigDB, every gene set tested enrichment. 	setType takes default value 2 ("C2: curated gene sets").  complete list gene set 	category can obtained 'getSetType' function. times number permutation seed seed number permutation

title: Permutation analysis of the enrichment test I — enrichTest1_Perm
text: permutation test randomly selects 'genesSize' number genes gene-set category 	'setType' candidate genes, based enrichment test conducted 	calculate enrichment p-value every gene set. 'times' number permutation performed 	obtain permutation distribution enrichment p-values every gene set.

text: returned value data frame. row names gene set/pathway ID. column names 	permutation id 1 'times'. cell value gene-set p value enrichment 	test .

what: Gene-set enrichment test II based on genome-wide study (GWS) results — enrichTest2
title: Gene-set enrichment test II based on genome-wide study (GWS) results — enrichTest2
text: enrichment analysis II applies Uniform-Score Gene-Set Analysis (USGSA) method test pathway 	enrichment based genome-wide association expression results.

title: Gene-set enrichment test II based on genome-wide study (GWS) results — enrichTest2
Gene-set enrichment test II based on genome-wide study (GWS) results — enrichTest2
text: geneDF data frame, matrix array least two columns: 'gene_id' column Entrez gene ID 	'score' column gene measures effect. gene measure can minP, 2ndP, simP fishP 	genome-wide association study (GWAS) differential expression p-value genome-wide 	expression study (GWES). gene measure can converted uniform score 'uscore' function. cut_score cut point value score defines significant gene. default cut point 0.05. 	'us'=TRUE, 'score' column 'geneDF' converted uniform score first 	used defining significant genes. 'us'=FALSE, 'score' column 'geneDF' 	directly used defining significant genes. hitSize 'hitSize' defines cut point filtering pathway enrichment test II. 	pathway gene set  < 'hitSize' GWS genes geneDF, gene set/pathway 	entered analysis procedure calculating p-value , NA value 	instead assigned. setType 'setType' integer numeric value gene-set category [0,20]. specifies gene 	set category MSigDB, every gene set tested enrichment. setType takes 	default value 2 ("C2: curated gene sets"). complete list gene 	set category can obtained 'getSetType' function.

title: Gene-set enrichment test II based on genome-wide study (GWS) results — enrichTest2
text: GWS, e.g. genome-wide association study (GWAS) genome-wide expression study (GWES), gene 	effect can measured SNP association (GWAS) differential gene expression (GWES). enrichment 	test II applies Uniform-Score Gene-Set Analysis (USGSA) method tests pathway enrichment GWS 	significant genes. significant genes identified scores measuring gene effects. 'enrichTest2' function takes argument 'geneDF' contains entrez gene ID ('gene_id') 	gene score ('score'), applies hypergeometric test calculate empirical p-value pathway 	enrichment GWS significant genes transformed uniform scores < = 'cut_score'. Gene scores, .e. 'score' column 'geneDF', first converted uniform scores gene 	defined significant uniform score less equal user pre-defined threshold 	'cut_score'. 'score' geneDF can gene measure, minp, sndp, simp fishp,	calculated SNP associaiton p-value 'getGeneMeasure' function. GWES, 'score' can also 	differential expression p-value GWES gene. general, gene measure smaller value 	indicating larger effect can used fill 'score' column 'geneDF' perform type II enrichment 	analysis.

title: Gene-set enrichment test II based on genome-wide study (GWS) results — enrichTest2
text: returned value list enrich_test data frame enrichment test II every gene set/pathway 	specified gene-set category ('setType'). 'pid': first column ('pid') MSigDB gene-set ID. 'size': second column ('size') shows number genes MSigDB gene set ; 'genes': third column ('genes') shows number GWS genes 'geneDF' 				belongs gene set enrichment test II. 'sigGenes': number GWS significant genes gene set . 'effect': increased percentage GWS significant genes pathway 				random expected percentage. 'sd': standard error 'effect'. 'pval': gene-set enrichment p-value based exact hypergeometric test.  useGenes integer vector Entrez Gene ID 'geneDF'  belongs 			specified gene-set category ('setType') used enrichment test II. nGenes number 'geneDF' genes used enrichment test II. equal 		length useGenes nSigGenes number GWS significant genes 'geneDF' belongs specified 		gene-set category ('setType') setTypeInfo list shows information specified gene-set category, 'setType' id: gene-set category ID symbol: gene-set category symbol name: gene-set category name description: gene-set category description

title: Gene-set enrichment test II based on genome-wide study (GWS) results — enrichTest2
text: http://www.broadinstitute.org/gsea/msigdb/collections.jsp Mei, H., Li, L., Liu, S., Jiang, F., Griswold, M., Mosley, T. (2015). uniform-score gene set analysis identifying common pathways associated different diabetes traits. BMC genomics 16, 336. PMID: 25898945. Mei, H., Li, L., et.al. (2016). snpGeneSets: R Package Genome-Wide Study Annotation. G3 6, 4087-4095. PMID: 27807048.

what: Permutation analysis of the enrichment test II — enrichTest2_Perm
title: Permutation analysis of the enrichment test II — enrichTest2_Perm
text: get permutation distribution enrichment test II specified MSigDB gene-set category.

title: Permutation analysis of the enrichment test II — enrichTest2_Perm
code: enrichTest2_Perm(geneDF=NULL, cut_score = 0.05, hitSize=0, setType = 2, times = 1000,      seed = 1, snpWeightDF=NULL)

title: Permutation analysis of the enrichment test II — enrichTest2_Perm
text: geneDF data frame, matrix array least two columns: 'gene_id' column Entrez gene ID 	'score' column gene measures effect. gene measure can minP, 2ndP, simP fishP 	genome-wide association study (GWAS) differential expression p-value genome-wide 	expression study (GWES). gene measure can converted uniform score 'uscore' function. cut_score cut point value score defines significant gene. default cut point 0.05. 	'us'=TRUE, 'score' column 'geneDF' converted uniform score first 	used defining significant genes. 'us'=FALSE, 'score' column 'geneDF' 	directly used defining significant genes. hitSize 'hitSize' defines cut point filtering pathway enrichment test II. 	pathway gene set  < 'hitSize' GWS genes geneDF, gene set/pathway 	entered analysis procedure calculating p-value , NA value 	instead assigned. setType 'setType' integer numeric value gene-set category [0,20]. specifies gene 	set category MSigDB, every gene set tested enrichment. 	setType takes default value 2 ("C2: curated gene sets").  complete list gene set 	category can obtained 'getSetType' function. times number permutation seed seed number permutation snpWeightDF data frame contains character vector 'snp' integer/numeric vector 'gene_id' snp-mapped gene. value data frame 'NULL', ever gene equal probability permutated sample randomly defined significant gene 'cut_score' threshold. null, genes larger number SNPs data frame higher probability permutated sample significant genes smaller number SNPs. genes 'geneDF' defined 'snpWeightDF', still randomly sampled significant equal probability.

title: Permutation analysis of the enrichment test II — enrichTest2_Perm
text: 'geneDF' provided, permutation test randomly permutes gene scores based provided 'score' column geneDF. 'geneDF' provided (.e. geneDF=NULL), permutation test randomly simulates score uniform distribution genes belonging specified gene-set category ('setType'). 'snpWeightDF' NULL, number SNPs tested gene used weight select gene significant testing enrichment. permuted samples, enrichment test II conducted test every pathway enrichment p-value specified gene-set category. gene-set enrichment p-values permuted samples form permutation distribution can used calculate pathway-specific unadjusted p-value permutation-adjusted p-value.

title: Permutation analysis of the enrichment test II — enrichTest2_Perm
text: returned value data frame. row names gene-set ID. column names permutation id 1 'times'. cell value gene-set (pathway) p value enrichment test II.

title: Permutation analysis of the enrichment test II — enrichTest2_Perm
text: Mei, H., Li, L., Liu, S., Jiang, F., Griswold, M., Mosley, T. (2015). uniform-score gene set analysis identifying common pathways associated different diabetes traits. BMC genomics 16, 336. PMID: 25898945. Mei, H., Li, L., et.al. (2016). snpGeneSets: R Package Genome-Wide Study Annotation. G3 6, 4087-4095. PMID: 27807048.

title: Permutation analysis of the enrichment test II — enrichTest2_Perm

title: Permutation analysis of the enrichment test II — enrichTest2_Perm
code: #It may take long time #get permutation distribution based on random gene pvalue from uniform distribution # enrich2_dist0=enrichTest2_Perm(setType=2,times=10) # dim(enrich2_dist0) # enrich2_dist0[1:5,1:5]  #get permutation distribution based on permuting provided gene p-value from geneDF # setGenes=getSetGenes(2) # geneDF=data.frame(gene_id=setGenes, score=runif(length(setGenes))) # enrich2_dist1=enrichTest2_Perm(geneDF, setType=2, times=10) # dim(enrich2_dist1) # enrich2_dist1[1:5,1:5]  # data(T2DGWAS) # geneDF=getGeneMeasure(snpGeneP);  # geneDF=with(geneDF,data.frame(gene_id=gene_id, score=minp)) # head(geneDF) # enrich2_dist2=enrichTest2_Perm(geneDF, setType=2, times=10) # dim(enrich2_dist2) # enrich2_dist2[1:5,1:5]  # snpWeightDF=snpGeneMap # head(snpWeightDF) # enrich2_dist3=enrichTest2_Perm(geneDF, setType=2, times=10, snpWeightDF=snpWeightDF) # enrich2_dist3[1:5,1:5]  # enrich2_dist4=enrichTest2_Perm(setType=2, times=10, snpWeightDF=snpWeightDF) # enrich2_dist4[1:5,1:5]

what: Get permutation p-value of enrichment test II — getEnrich2P
title: Get permutation p-value of enrichment test II — getEnrich2P
text: function gets permutation p-value enrichment test II pre-generated 	distribution table 10,000 permutations.

title: Get permutation p-value of enrichment test II — getEnrich2P
Get permutation p-value of enrichment test II — getEnrich2P
text: setP numeric vector observed pathway empirical p-value enrichment test II 'enrichTest2' function. 	'setP=NULL', function return permutation distribution table particular gene-set 	category. 'setP' NULL, permuted p-value calculated every observed 	p-value 'setP' setType 'setType' integer numeric value gene-set category [0,20]. defines candidate 	gene sets getting permutation distribution table. permutation table minimum p-value 	candidate gene sets every permutation. 'setType' default 2 function 	gets permutation distribution table gene sets category: "C2: curated gene sets". 	complete list gene set category can obtained 'getSetType' function. cut_score 'cut_score' cut point value score defines GWAS significant gene. 	function, specifies permutation table pre-generated cut_score. 	(refer 'enrichTest2_Perm' function details). Currently, two permutation tables 	available based 0.05 0.01. default cut point 0.05.

title: Get permutation p-value of enrichment test II — getEnrich2P
text: function get permutation distribution smallest p-value 	candidate gene sets (defined 'setType') pre-generated data 10,000 	permutations. 'setP'=NULL, permutation distribution returned. 'setP' 	NULL, permuted p-value calculated every observed p-value 'setP' 	comparing permutation table.

title: Get permutation p-value of enrichment test II — getEnrich2P
text: returned value list perm data frame shows observed enrichment p-value first column 	('setP'), corresponding permutation p-value second column ('p') . dist permutation distribution table smallest p-value 	candidate gene sets (see 'setType').

title: Get permutation p-value of enrichment test II — getEnrich2P
text: Mei, H., Li, L., Liu, S., Jiang, F., Griswold, M., Mosley, T. (2015). uniform-score gene set analysis identifying common pathways associated different diabetes traits. BMC genomics 16, 336. PMID: 25898945. Mei, H., Li, L., et.al. (2016). snpGeneSets: R Package Genome-Wide Study Annotation. G3 6, 4087-4095. PMID: 27807048.

title: Get permutation p-value of enrichment test II — getEnrich2P
text: H. Mei; L Li

title: Get gene map information — getGeneMap
text: http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/gene

title: Get gene map information — getGeneMap
text: H Mei; L Li

title: Get gene map information — getGeneMap

what: Get gene measures from GWAS SNP associations — getGeneMeasure
title: Get gene measures from GWAS SNP associations — getGeneMeasure
text: function calculates 4 measures gene effects best p-value (minP), second best p-value (2ndP), Simes' p-value (simP) Fisher's p-value (fishP) p-values GWAS SNP associations

title: Get gene measures from GWAS SNP associations — getGeneMeasure
Get gene measures from GWAS SNP associations — getGeneMeasure
text: snpGeneP data frame contains three columns: 'snp' character vector SNP rs ids; 'gene_id' 	integer numeric vector Entrez gene id covers 'snp'; 'p' p-value 	GWAS SNP association.

title: Get gene measures from GWAS SNP associations — getGeneMeasure
text: every gene 'gene_id' column snpGeneP, GWAS association p-values SNPs 	summarized get minP, 2ndP, simP fishP. K SNPs mapped gene GWAS p-values 	(p1, p2,...,pk), ordered p-value defined p(1)<p(2)<...<p(k), p(1)=min { p1, p2,...,pk } 	p(k)=max{p1, p2,..., pk}. Four gene measures calculated respectively minP=p(1), 2ndP=p(2) , 	simP=min{Kp()/} fishP=Pr(X > x=-2 Sigma { log(p_i ) )=Phi(x) }, Phi chi-square 	distribution function df=2K.

title: Get gene measures from GWAS SNP associations — getGeneMeasure
text: data frame 5 columns: 'gene_id', entrez gene ID; 'minp', minP gene measures ; '2ndp', 	2ndP gene measures; 'simp', simP gene measures; 'fishp', fishP 	gene measures.

title: Get gene measures from GWAS SNP associations — getGeneMeasure
text: Mei, H., Li, L., Liu, S., Jiang, F., Griswold, M., Mosley, T. (2015). uniform-score gene set analysis identifying common pathways associated different diabetes traits. BMC genomics 16, 336. PMID: 25898945. Mei, H., Li, L., et.al. (2016). snpGeneSets: R Package Genome-Wide Study Annotation. G3 6, 4087-4095. PMID: 27807048.

title: Get gene measures from GWAS SNP associations — getGeneMeasure
text: H.Mei; L Li

what: Get genes in a genomic region — getRegionGene
title: Get genes in a genomic region — getRegionGene
text: function identifies genes overlapping candidate genomic region based NCBI Gene database GRCh37/hg19 GRCh38/hg38

title: Get genes in a genomic region — getRegionGene
Get genes in a genomic region — getRegionGene
text: regionDF data frame. must contain columns 'chr' 'start'. 	'chr' character vector  chromosomes. supported chromosome ID can obtained 	function, 'getChrs'. 'start' integer numeric vector region start position. 	optional column 'end'. 'end' exists, genomic region defined 'start' 	'end'. Otherwise, genomic region single nucleotide position defined 'start'. 	'start' 'end' position based unit base pairs. GRCh reference genome build number, either 37 38. number 37, GRCh37 hg19; number 38, GRCh38 hg38

title: Get genes in a genomic region — getRegionGene
text: function applies three criteria identify overlapped genes candidate genomic 	region: 1) gene transcription start site inside genomic region;  2) gene 	transcription stop site inside genomic region; 3)genomic region inside 	gene transcript.

title: Get genes in a genomic region — getRegionGene
text: returned value data frame. chr chromosome ID gene start Gene transcription start site base pair end Gene transcription stop site base pair strand + - strand gene_name HGNC gene symbol gene_id Entrez gene ID

text: http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/gene

text: H Mei; L Li

title: Get genes in a genomic region — getRegionGene
code: #get genes include position of 78786077 at chr 14 # regionDF=data.frame(chr="14", start=78786077, stringsAsFactors=FALSE); # getRegionGene(regionDF) # getRegionGene(regionDF,38)  #Get genes include specified start positions at multiple chromosomes  # chr=c("14","1","18","16","16"); # start=c(78786077, 213910494, 57850422, 53813450, 53820527); # end=start+1000; # regionDF=data.frame(chr=chr, start=start, stringsAsFactors=FALSE); # getRegionGene(regionDF) # getRegionGene(regionDF,38)  #get genes at multiple genomic regions defined by 'start' and 'end' # regionDF=data.frame(chr=chr, start=start, end=end, stringsAsFactors=FALSE); # getRegionGene(regionDF) # getRegionGene(regionDF,38)  #get all genes from position 1 t0 100000 bp at chr 1. # getRegionGene(data.frame(chr="1", start=1, end=100000, stringsAsFactors=FALSE)) # getRegionGene(data.frame(chr="1", start=1, end=100000, stringsAsFactors=FALSE),38)

title: Build pathway annotation database from MSigDB gene sets — msigdb_build

title: Build pathway annotation database from MSigDB gene sets — msigdb_build
text: function parses 41 GMT files 8 major gene-set categories (including "H: hallmark gene sets") MSigDB 6.1, build locally integrated 	pathway database two-way mapping genes pathways pathway enrichment analysis II. function 	classifies gene sets total 21 categories type ID, 'setType', 0 20, based classification 	MSigDB Collections. simplify reference MSigDB gene sets, function assigns unique number every 	gene set, labeled 'PID' directly used annotation enrichment analysis. data gene sets can downloaded : http://software.broadinstitute.org/gsea/msigdb/download_file.jsp?filePath=/resources/msigdb/6.1/msigdb_v6.1_files_to_download_locally.zip
